resources.string: Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and relax in the tranquil surroundings of Jurong Lake Gardens.
Best for a morning or afternoon visit
Jurong Lake Gardens is a beautiful and tranquil park located in the heart of Jurong, featuring a wide range of flora and fauna, as well as lakes, gardens, and other natural attractions.

To make the most of your visit to Jurong Lake Gardens, start with a leisurely stroll through the park\'s many gardens and natural areas, taking in the sights and sounds of the local flora and fauna. Don\'t miss the Lakeside Garden, which features a stunning 7-hectare lake and a range of water sports and activities. If you\'re looking for some culture, be sure to visit the Chinese Garden and Japanese Garden, which offer a glimpse into the local architecture and traditions. And if you\'re feeling hungry or thirsty, stop by the park\'s many cafes and restaurants, which offer a range of delicious snacks and refreshments inspired by the local cuisine.
